name: burger
description: How The App Should Work Eat-Da-Burger! is an app that utilizes Node.js, Express.js, Handlebars, and MySQL. It lets users input the names of burgers they'd like to eat. Whenever a user submits a burger's name, your app will display the burger on the left side of the page -- waiting to be devoured. Each burger in the waiting area also has a Devour it! button. When the user clicks it, the burger will move to the right side of the page. Your app will store every burger in a database, whether devoured or not.
